name: Chronicler Adelyn

skills.name: Equivalent Exchange
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of transferring 1 random debuff from this Champion to the target. Also has a 50% chance of stealing 1 random buff from the target.

effects.notes: Single target. 50% chance to transfer debuff and steal buff.

skills.notes: Chance increases to 75% when fully booked.

skills.name: Healing Script
skills.description: Restores 25% of each ally’s destroyed MAX HP, then heals all allies by 25% of this Champion’s MAX HP.

effects.notes: Restores 25% of each ally's destroyed MAX HP.
Heals all allies by 25% of this Champion's MAX HP.

skills.name: Writ of Sleep
skills.description: Has a 75% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff on a target for 1 turn. Also has a 75% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] and a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Debuffs placed by this skill ignore [Block Debuffs] buffs.

skills.name: Perceive Weakness
skills.description: Allies deal 3% more damage to targets for each debuff placed on them by this Champion.

forms.aura: Increases Ally ACC in All Battles by 60.
forms.comments: A2 and A3 are the main book priorities. A3 is key for Sand Devil and other bosses requiring Sleep.

general: PRIORITY OFFENSE T6: WARMASTER (A1 'Equivalent Exchange' is single-hit attack - 60% proc per skill for 4% boss MAX HP / 6% dungeon boss MAX HP damage). Giant Slayer is INCORRECT for Chronicler Adelyn (no multi-hit skills - current 'dungeons' entry is a mistake).

PRIORITY SUPPORT T6: Master Hexer (CRITICAL for Dec ATK/Dec SPD extension from A3 - extends from 2→3 turns. NOTE: Will NOT extend Sleep debuff as it's crowd control), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC - synergizes with 60 ACC aura for 110+ total, enables 250+ ACC Doom Tower Hard, 350+ ACC Arena builds).

KEY MASTERIES: Warmaster (A1 single-hit), Master Hexer (Dec ATK/Dec SPD extension from A3 - Sleep will NOT extend), Eagle Eye (ACC boost - 60 ACC aura synergy), Lay on Hands + Healing Savior (A2 heal boost - restores destroyed MAX HP + heals 25% MAX HP), Cycle of Magic (A2/A3 cooldown spam), Timely Intervention (TM on ally low HP for support).

SYNERGIES: A1 transfers debuff from self to enemy (50% base, 75% booked) + steals buff from enemy (50% base, 75% booked). A2 restores 25% destroyed MAX HP for all allies + heals 25% of HER MAX HP (benefits from Lay on Hands + Healing Savior, key for Sand Devil/Scarab King/Artak teams). A3 places Sleep + Dec SPD 30% + Dec ATK 50% for 2 turns (75% base, 100% booked) - all debuffs IGNORE Block Debuffs (cheese for Sand Devil, Doom Tower). Passive grants all allies +3% damage per debuff placed by Adelyn (synergizes with A3 multi-debuff). Build for 220+ SPD, 250+ ACC (350+ Arena) with Eagle Eye + 60 ACC aura = 110 base, HP%/DEF% for sustain.

DOOM TOWER SPECIALIST: Chronicler Adelyn is a meta solution for Sand Devil (8/10 Doom Tower rating) - A3 Sleep + Dec ATK/Dec SPD ignores Block Debuffs, A2 restores destroyed MAX HP (Sand Devil passive destroys MAX HP). Also strong for Scarab King (A2 MAX HP restore) and general Doom Tower content.

UNIQUE MECHANICS: A2 restores destroyed MAX HP BEFORE healing (unique mechanic, synergizes with Artak, Sand Devil passive, Brimstone Blast sets). A3 debuffs IGNORE Block Debuffs (cheese for many bosses). 60 ACC aura for all battles (excellent for debuff teams). Passive damage amp (+3% per debuff) stacks with team debuffs.
AI QUIRK: AI may target enemies immune to Sleep (Clan Boss, some bosses) and waste A3 turns. Manual play recommended for Clan Boss if using.

mechanics_advisory: Chronicler Adelyn is a specialist support (Doom Tower 8/10, Dungeons 8/10, Faction Wars 8/10, Arena 7/10, Clan Boss 6/10). A1 'Equivalent Exchange' is single-hit that benefits from Warmaster (60% proc, 4% boss MAX HP). KEY STRENGTHS: (1) A2 'Healing Script' restores 25% destroyed MAX HP for all allies BEFORE healing 25% of HER MAX HP (unique mechanic, synergizes with Artak, Sand Devil passive, Brimstone Blast sets - benefits from Lay on Hands + Healing Savior), (2) A3 'Writ of Sleep' places Sleep + Dec SPD 30% + Dec ATK 50% for 2 turns (75% base, 100% booked) - all debuffs IGNORE Block Debuffs (cheese for Sand Devil, Doom Tower bosses), (3) Passive grants all allies +3% damage per debuff placed by Adelyn (synergizes with A3 multi-debuff), (4) 60 ACC aura for all battles (synergizes with Eagle Eye +50 ACC for 110+ total, enables 250+ ACC Doom Tower Hard, 350+ ACC Arena builds). REQUIRES Master Hexer (CRITICAL - extends Dec ATK/Dec SPD 2→3 turns, NOTE: Will NOT extend Sleep as it's crowd control) + Eagle Eye (+50 ACC). Build for 220+ SPD, 250+ ACC (350+ Arena), HP%/DEF% for sustain. DOOM TOWER: Meta solution for Sand Devil (A3 Sleep + debuffs ignore Block Debuffs, A2 restores destroyed MAX HP) and Scarab King (A2 MAX HP restore). AI QUIRK: May waste A3 on bosses immune to Sleep (manual recommended for Clan Boss). User's Banner Lords Faction Wars COMPLETE (Normal) - strong for Hard progression (8/10 rating).
